rows.label: qst720104_msg0003
rows.name:
There's so much ether around here.
We're bound to find some nice stuff
if we look around.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0004
rows.name:
Ah! So the abundance of ether must
have been what made the miasma form
in the first place.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0005
rows.name:
Indeed. Well, if we run into any more
miasmas, I trust you'll do the work,
Kasumi!

rows.label: qst720104_msg0006
rows.name: Of course! Leave it to me.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0007
rows.name: I'm so glad you're with us.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0008
rows.name:
"Otherwise I'd be forced to rely on that
loose cannon Hikari," right?

rows.label: qst720104_msg0009
rows.name: No, that's not what I meant.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0010
rows.name:
You've always been my only Blade,
so you don't have any experience of
working together with other Blades.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0011
rows.name:
That's my fault. But I'm sure that by
traveling with Kasumi and Shin, you'll
learn a lot about your power.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0012
rows.name: And that's a good thing, right?

rows.label: qst720104_msg0013
rows.name: Way to lay expectations on me.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0014
rows.name:
I'll give this cooperation thing a go...
but I'm not making any promises
about learning anything from it.
